result.arabic_text: وَيُسَبِّحُ ٱلرَّعۡدُ بِحَمۡدِهِۦ وَٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ مِنۡ خِيفَتِهِۦ وَيُرۡسِلُ ٱلصَّوَٰعِقَ فَيُصِيبُ بِهَا مَن يَشَآءُ وَهُمۡ يُجَٰدِلُونَ فِي ٱللَّهِ وَهُوَ شَدِيدُ ٱلۡمِحَالِ
result.translation: N’inkuba isingiza (Allah) mu ishimwe rye ryuzuye, ndetse n’Abamalayika (bakamusingiza) kubera kumutinya. Anohereza urusaku rw’inkuba akaruhanisha uwo ashaka; mu gihe (abahakanyi) baba bajya impaka kuri Allah, kandi ari Nyirukuburizamo bikomeye imigambi mibisha (wubikira abahakanyi).
